text: buffy_summers NO ! NO !
buffy_summers No ... .
joyce_summers Yes .
joyce_summers It 's time to get up for school .
buffy_summers Mom ?
joyce_summers Are you alright ?
buffy_summers No . Uh , yeah ! Yeah ! I 'm , I 'm fine ! Oh ... School ! Great .
joyce_summers You wanna go to school ?
buffy_summers Sure ! Why not ?
joyce_summers Okay . Good day to buy that lottery ticket . I spoke with your father .
buffy_summers He 's coming , right ?
joyce_summers You 're on for this weekend .
buffy_summers Good .
willow_rosenberg So , do you see your dad a lot ?
buffy_summers Not a whole lot .
buffy_summers He 's still in L.A. He , like , comes down for weekends sometimes .
willow_rosenberg When did they get divorced ?
buffy_summers Well , it was n't finalized till last year , but they were separated before that .
willow_rosenberg Musta been harsh .
buffy_summers Yeah , that 's the word you 're looking for . I - I mean , they were really good about it around me , anyway , but still ... .
willow_rosenberg My parents do n't even bicker . Sometimes they glare . Do you know why your folks split up ?
buffy_summers I did n't ask . They just stopped getting along . I 'm sure I was a really big help , though , with all the slaying and everything . I was in so much trouble . I was a big mess .
willow_rosenberg Well , I 'm sure that did n't have anything to do with him leaving .
buffy_summers No .
willow_rosenberg And he still comes down on weekends .
buffy_summers Sometimes .
cordelia_chase Hello ? Doofus ! You 're in my light .
xander_harris Wendell , what is wrong with you ? Do n't you know that she is the center of the universe , and the rest of us merely revolve around her ?
cordelia_chase Why do n't you revolve yourselves out of my light ?
xander_harris Uh , Wendell was in Cordelia 's light .
wendell I 'm so ashamed .
willow_rosenberg Why is she so Evita - like ?
buffy_summers I think it 's the hair .
willow_rosenberg It weighs heavy on the cerebral cortex .
xander_harris Hey , guys , was there any homework ?
willow_rosenberg We 're doing active listening today .
xander_harris Cool ! What 's active listening ?
willow_rosenberg That would be the homework .
buffy_summers Chapter five ? Active listening ? Where you put on your big ears and really focus on the other person ?
wendell Ms. Tishler demonstrated it yesterday .
willow_rosenberg With you !
buffy_summers She was wearing that tight sweater ?
xander_harris Oh , the midnight blue angora ! See , I was listening .
ms_tishler Alright , take your seats . In a moment we will choose partners and practice what we read about in chapter five .
ms_tishler Good , Xander , that 's the spirit !
ms_tishler Before we do , let 's review . Isaacson 's research led him to conclude that one of our most fundamental needs after food and shelter is to be heard .
ms_tishler Wendell , would you read the first two paragraphs on page seventy - eight ... .
ms_tishler ... where Isaacson describes the rapid improvement active listening brought to some special needs clients .
wendell Please ! Get 'em off of me ! Help ! Help ! Get 'em off of me ! Help me ! Oh , please help me ! Please !
billy_palmer Sorry about that .
wendell Please help me !
the_master Fear is a wonderful thing . It is * the * most powerful force in the human world . Not love , not hate ... Fear ! When you were a mortal boy , what did you fear ?
collin Monsters .

the_master Ooo . We are * defined * by the things we fear . This symbol , these two planks of wood , it confounds me . Suffuses me with mortal dread . But fear is in the mind . Like pain . It can be controlled . If I can face my fear , it can not master me . Something is happening above . Something new , powerful , psychic force . Do you feel it ?
collin I feel change .
the_master Change . Yes . For the worse .
joyce_summers You 're awfully quiet this morning .
buffy_summers I did n't sleep well .
joyce_summers I 'll say . I came in to check on you twice . You were yelling in your sleep . Do you know what you were dreaming ?
buffy_summers Not really . Oh , no , my bag ! I - I packed it for the weekend and I forgot it !
joyce_summers You and your dad can swing by the house and get your bag . It 's not an international crisis .
buffy_summers Okay . Yeah , I just , uh , had meant to bring it . H - he 's picking me up here , right ? A - at 3:30 ?
joyce_summers Honey , a - are you worried your father is n't gon na show ?
buffy_summers No ! N - not really . Should I be ?
joyce_summers Well , of course , not ! I - I - I just , I - I know it 's a hard situation . You just have to remember that your father adores you . No more than I do , by the way .
buffy_summers Goodbye .
joyce_summers Have a great day .
buffy_summers Thanks .
willow_rosenberg Oh , Buffy , we 've been looking for you .
xander_harris We have ?
willow_rosenberg Oh , about the spiders , did you talk to Giles about ... .
xander_harris Oh , the spiders ! Willow 's been kind of , um , what 's the word I 'm looking for ? Insane about what happened yesterday .

willow_rosenberg I do n't like spiders , okay ? Their furry bodies , and their sticky webs , and what do they need all those legs for anyway ? I 'll tell you : for crawling across your face in the middle of the night . Ewww ! How do they not ruffle you ?
xander_harris I 'm sorry ! I 'm unruffled by spiders . Now , if a bunch of Nazis crawled all over my face ... .
buffy_summers Mm , it was pretty intense .
willow_rosenberg Thank you .
xander_harris Well , the Hellmouth , the center of mystical convergence , supernatural monsters : been there .
buffy_summers Little blase ' there , are n't you ?
xander_harris I 'm not worried . If there 's something bad out there we 'll find , you 'll slay , we 'll party !
buffy_summers Thanks for having confidence in me .
xander_harris You da man , Buff !
willow_rosenberg Okay , but we 're still caring about the spiders here . Let 's not forget the spiders .
buffy_summers Well , Giles said he was gon na look it up . Giles ?
willow_rosenberg Maybe he 's in the faculty room .
buffy_summers Hey , Giles ! Wakey , wakey !
rupert_giles I was , uh , in the stacks . I got lost .
xander_harris Did you find any theories on spiders coming out of books ?
xander_harris Big , hairy , crawly ... .
xander_harris It 's funny if you 're me .
rupert_giles I could n't find anything , uh ... particularly illuminating . Um , I think perhaps you 'd best have a chat with Wendell himself .
buffy_summers Okay . If he can still talk .
buffy_summers Hey , Wendell . How are you ?
wendell Huh ?
buffy_summers You okay ?
xander_harris Good talking to ya , man .
wendell Do you guys want something ?
buffy_summers We just thought you might wanna talk about what happened .
willow_rosenberg You know , yesterday ? With the spiders ?
wendell I do n't know what to say about that .
xander_harris There 's nothing * to * say . You saw two hundred insects , you Gonzoed , anybody would have .
wendell They 're not insects . They 're arachnids .
xander_harris They 're from the Middle East ?
wendell Spiders are arachnids . They have eight legs . Insects only have six . Why does everyone make that mistake ?
buffy_summers Do n't know . Has anything like this ever happened before ?
buffy_summers When ?
wendell Lots of times .
willow_rosenberg Ew ! You must hate spiders more than I do .
wendell I do n't hate spiders . I love 'em . They hate me .
cordelia_chase I hope you studied for the history test .
buffy_summers What history test ?
cordelia_chase The one we 're having in fourth period right now .
buffy_summers There 's a history test ? Nobody told me there was a history test ! I have n't ... I ... Okay , I will catch up with you guys later .
willow_rosenberg What do you mean , you love spiders ?
xander_harris It is platonic , right ?

wendell I had the best collection in the tri - county area . Browns and tarantulas and black widows ... Then my folks shipped me off to wilderness camp . All my brother had to do was maintain their habitats . Instead he left their heat lamp on for a week . When I came home they were all dead . That 's when the nightmares started .
willow_rosenberg The nightmares ?

wendell It 's always the same . I 'm sitting in the classroom , teacher asks me to read something , I open up my book and then there they are . They 're comin ' after me . God , can you blame them after what I did ?
xander_harris And that 's how it happens ? Every time ?
wendell Yesterday in class I thought I 'd just nodded off again . But then everyone else started screaming , too .
cordelia_chase You do n't know where class is , do you ?
buffy_summers Uh ... .
cordelia_chase Hardly a shocker . You 've cut history just about every time we 've had it .
buffy_summers Well , I was there the first day . I think .
cordelia_chase It 's in here .
buffy_summers I have n't been to class , I have n't read any of the assignments , how am I gon na pass this test ?
cordelia_chase Blind luck ?
buffy_summers Well , at least I know my name .
laura Well , they both got detention , which is completely unfair since Sean started it . Anyway , it means we ca n't do the movie .
laura I 'm gon na take a break .
billy_palmer You should n't go in there .
Ugly_Man Lucky nineteen !
buffy_summers I think they said room 3016 .
rupert_giles Do you know the girl ?
buffy_summers To say hi to . Laura 's nice enough . Nobody saw who attacked her ?
rupert_giles Well , I was rather hoping that Laura did .
buffy_summers Hey , Laura .
laura Hi .
rupert_giles I hope we 're not intruding , um ... .
laura That 's okay . I do n't wanna be left alone .
rupert_giles You understand we 're anxious to make sure this , this does n't happen again .
buffy_summers Can you tell us what happened ?
laura I was in the basement . I went down for a smoke . There was ... someone there .
buffy_summers Someone you knew ?
laura I 've never ... seen anything like it .
buffy_summers It ?
rupert_giles Can you describe it ?
buffy_summers Hey , that 's okay . Do n't worry about it .
rupert_giles Yes , you , you , you just rest now .
buffy_summers You know , but ... .
Nurse Hi , Laura .
buffy_summers ... i - if you remember anything ? You can tell us . Even if it may seem weird .
Nurse She needs her rest now .
laura ' Lucky nineteen . '
rupert_giles I 'm sorry ?
laura It 's what he said , right before ... He said ' lucky nineteen ' . That 's weird , right ?
rupert_giles Yes . Yes , it is .
buffy_summers Feel better .
rupert_giles Take care .
rupert_giles Doctor , is she gon na be alright ?
doctor You family ?
buffy_summers Friends .
doctor She 'll recover . She 's got a couple of shattered bones , a little internal bleeding ... she got off pretty easy .
buffy_summers Easy ?
rupert_giles Have you looked up the word lately ?
doctor Well , the first one 's still in a coma .
buffy_summers First what ?
doctor First victim . They found him a week ago . Exact same M.O. as the girl , only he 's in worse shape . If he does n't wake up soon ... Somebody 's got ta stop this guy .
buffy_summers Somebody will .
Punk Listen , I 'm not afraid of him .
Punk Hey , if he wants to fight , then I 'm takin ' him down . I 'm not backin ' off on this . This is about honor . I 'll break his neck !
willow_rosenberg I 'm just saying , Wendell had a dream and then that exact thing happened .
xander_harris Which is a fair wiggins , I admit , but do you think that ties in with Laura ?
willow_rosenberg I dunno . Maybe she dreamed about getting beat up . We should ask Buffy when she gets back from the hospital .
Mother Oh , there 's my little baby !
Punk Mom , what are you doing here ? Mom ... .
Mother How 's my little pookie ?
Punk Mom , mom , please do n't kiss me in front of the guys ! It 's embarrassing , mom ! Please !
Mother You cute little rascal , you !
Punk Mom ... . Thanks , but mom , please , my friends are right here ... .
xander_harris It could be a coincidence . Y'know , Wendell finds a spider 's nest , and we all wig because he dreamt about spiders . So it may not be connected .
xander_harris If there is a connection it does n't sound like anything ... What ?
willow_rosenberg Xander ! What happened to your ... ? !
xander_harris I - I - I dunno ! I was , uh , dressed a minute ago ! It 's a dream . It 's got ta be a dream . Ow ! Wake up . Ow ! Got ta wake up .
rupert_giles This ca n't be happening . This ca n't be ... .
buffy_summers What 's the word ?
rupert_giles Oh , uh , I 've got back issues of the , uh , papers , um , to try to do some research .
buffy_summers Did you find anything ?
rupert_giles I do n't know .
buffy_summers You do n't know if you did n't find anything .
rupert_giles I 'm having a problem .
buffy_summers What is it ?
rupert_giles I - I ca n't read !
buffy_summers What do you mean ? You can read , like , three languages .
rupert_giles Five , actually , on a normal day . Th - the words here do n't make any s - sense . I - it 's gibberish !
buffy_summers That 's him .
rupert_giles Who ?

buffy_summers The kid I 've been seeing around school . ' Twelve - year - old Billy Palmer was found beaten and unconscious after his kiddie league game Saturday . Doctors describe his condition as critical . ' When was this published ? Last week . It says he 's in a coma in intensive care . This is the boy from the hospital !
rupert_giles The first victim ? Uh ... You , you 've seen him around the school ?
buffy_summers Yeah , first when the spiders got Wendell , and , and then when I did n't know a thing on the history test . I thought it was weird seeing this kid around , but I forgot about it .
rupert_giles Uh , the boy 's been in a coma for a week . How can this be possible ?
buffy_summers What , am I knowledge girl now ? Explanations are your terrain .
rupert_giles Uh , well , um , there 's astral projection , uh , the theory that while one sleeps one has another body , a - an astral body , which can travel through time and space .
buffy_summers Billy 's in a coma . That 's like sleep , right ?
rupert_giles In a manner of speaking , a - a - although one does n't always awake from a coma .
buffy_summers Could I be seeing Billy 's asteroid body ?
rupert_giles Astral body , and I - I do n't know . As usual , one does n't have an inordinate amount of information to work with .
buffy_summers Lucky nineteen .
hank_summers There you are ! I 've been looking everywhere . Why are n't you in class ?
buffy_summers Dad , what are you doing here ? Y - you're not supposed to pick me up till after school . Is something wrong ?
hank_summers Well , I , I need to talk to you .
buffy_summers Something * is * wrong . Is it mom ?
hank_summers No , no , it 's not your mother , she 's fine . Could I speak with you for a moment ? Privately ?
buffy_summers Um , sure ! Yeah . Uh , oh ! I 'm sorry . Dad , this is Mr. Giles , the librarian . Uh , this is my dad , Hank Summers .
rupert_giles My pleasure .
hank_summers Likewise .
buffy_summers I 'll be back .
hank_summers I came early because there 's something I 've needed to tell you . About your mother and me . Why we split up .
buffy_summers Well , you always told me it was because ... .
hank_summers Uh , I know we always said it was because we 'd just grown too far apart .
buffy_summers Yeah , is n't that true ?
hank_summers Well , c'mon , honey , let 's , let 's sit down . You 're old enough now to know the truth .
buffy_summers Is there someone else ?
hank_summers No . No , it was nothing like that .
buffy_summers Then what was it ?
hank_summers It was you .
buffy_summers Me ?
hank_summers Having you . Raising you . Seeing you everyday . I mean , do you have any idea what that 's like ?
buffy_summers What ?

hank_summers Gosh , you do n't even see what 's right in front of your face , do you ? Well , big surprise there , all you ever think about is yourself . You get in trouble . You embarrass us with all the crazy stunts you pull , and do I have to go on ?
buffy_summers No . Please do n't .

hank_summers You 're sullen and ... rude and ... you 're not nearly as bright as I thought you were going to be ... Hey , Buffy , let 's be honest . Could you stand to live in the same house with a daughter like that ?
buffy_summers Why are you saying all these things ?
hank_summers Because they 're true . I think that 's the least we owe one another .

hank_summers You know , I do n't think it 's very mature , getting blubbery when I 'm just trying to be honest . Speaking of which , I do n't really get anything out of these weekends with you . So , what do you say we just do n't do them anymore ?
hank_summers I sure thought you 'd turn out differently .
xander_harris Red alert ! Where 's Buffy ?
rupert_giles Uh , she , she just stepped out . Her , her father came by early . He , he needed to talk to her . W ... where are your other clothes ?
xander_harris Oh , do n't I wish I had the answer to * that * question .
willow_rosenberg Xander kinda found himself in front of our class not wearing much of anything .
xander_harris Except my underwear .
willow_rosenberg Yeah ! It was really ... ... bad . It was a bad thing .
xander_harris ' Bad thing ' ? I was naked . ' Bad thing ' does n't cover it .
willow_rosenberg Everyone staring ? I would hate to have everyone paying attention to me like that .
xander_harris With nudity ! It 's a total nightmare .
willow_rosenberg Well , yeah Xander ! I - it 's your nightmare !
xander_harris Except the part with me waking up goin' ' it 's all a dream ' . It happened .
willow_rosenberg Like it happened to Wendell . That thing with the spiders ? Wendell had a recurring dream about that .
rupert_giles I - I dreamt that I got lost in the stacks and I ... I could n't read ... Of course !
xander_harris Uh , our dreams are coming true ?
rupert_giles Dreams ? That would be a musical comedy version of this . Nightmares , our , our nightmares are coming true .
willow_rosenberg So , why is this happening ?
rupert_giles Billy .
xander_harris Well , that explanation was shorter than usual . It 's Billy ! Who 's Billy ?
rupert_giles He 's a boy in the local hospital . He was beaten . He 's in a coma . Somehow I think he 's crossed over from the nightmare world he 's trapped in .
xander_harris And he brought the nightmare world with him . Thanks a bunch , Billy .
willow_rosenberg How could he do that ?
rupert_giles Things like that are easy when you live on a Hellmouth .
xander_harris Well , um , we have to stop it .
rupert_giles And soon . Or else everyone in Sunnydale is gon na be facing their own worst nightmares .
cordelia_chase I do n't understand ! This ca n't be happening ! I was just at the salon !
cordelia_chase Oh , my God !
buffy_summers Billy ?
buffy_summers Are you Billy Palmer ?
billy_palmer I 'm Billy .
buffy_summers Why are you here ? Did something bad happen to you after your game ?
billy_palmer Something bad ? I , I do n't remember .
buffy_summers Do you remember playing baseball ?
billy_palmer Uh huh . Yeah . I play second base .
buffy_summers Are you ' lucky nineteen ' ?
billy_palmer That 's what he calls me .
buffy_summers Who ?
billy_palmer The Ugly Man . He wants to kill me . A - and he hurt that girl .
buffy_summers Why does he want to kill you , Billy ?
billy_palmer He 's ... .
buffy_summers Billy , it 's okay ! What ? Just tell me .
billy_palmer He 's here !
rupert_giles Buffy does n't know this is happening . And given the sort of thing that she tends to dream about , it 's imperative that we find her .
xander_harris Probably faster if we split up to look for her .
rupert_giles Good idea .
willow_rosenberg Oh , uh , faster , but ... not really safer .
buffy_summers Billy !
billy_palmer I 'm sorry , I ca n't help it .
buffy_summers Who is he ?
billy_palmer He 's the Ugly Man .
buffy_summers He 's too strong ! I ca n't fight him ! We have to find my friends . They can help us .
billy_palmer We have to hide .
buffy_summers No ! He 'll find us !
billy_palmer Yes , but we have to hide . That 's how it happens . We hide , and then he comes .
cordelia_chase No ! What are you doing ! Hey , no ! You do n't understand ! I do n't wanna go ! I 'm not even on the chess team ! I swear , I 'm not !
Voice Willow !
cordelia_chase Nohoho !
Voice Willow !
willow_rosenberg Buffy ?
willow_rosenberg Hello ? Buffy ?
willow_rosenberg I 'm not afraid . You 'd think I 'd be afraid , but I 'm not .
xander_harris Alright ! Someone else 's loss is my chocolatey goodness .
xander_harris This is my lucky day !
buffy_summers Wha ... I was sure this led to the library .
buffy_summers They 're just playing . What is it ? What 's bothering you ?
billy_palmer Baseball . When you lose , it 's bad .
buffy_summers Did you lose your game last week ?
billy_palmer It was my fault .
buffy_summers Why was it your fault ?
billy_palmer I missed a ball and I should have caught it .
buffy_summers You missed one ball and the whole game was your fault ? What , you were the only one playing ? There was n't eight other people on your team ?
billy_palmer He said it was my fault .
buffy_summers Who said ? Billy , did he hurt you after the game ?
billy_palmer Can we go another way to find your friends ?
buffy_summers Sure . Okay . We can go around the cafeteria .
buffy_summers Bad idea ! Uh , this way ! C'mon !
buffy_summers What just happened ?
billy_palmer Is this where your friends are ?
buffy_summers No , it 's not .
Director Man , I thought you were n't gon na show ! Aldo is beside himself .
Emcee Ladies and Gentlemen , we are proud to present two of the world 's greatest singers !
Director I hope you 're warmed up . It 's an ugly crowd out there tonight . All the reviewers showed up .
Emcee All the way from Firenze , Italy , the one and only Aldo Gianfranco ! And all the way from Sunnydale , California , the world 's finest soprano , Willow Rosenberg !
willow_rosenberg But I ... I did n't learn the words !
aldo_gianfranco Bimba dagli occhi pieni di malia , ora sei tutta mia .
Translation Child , from whose eyes the witchery is shining , now you are all my own .
aldo_gianfranco Sei tutta vestita di giglio . Mi piace la treccia tua bruna fra i candidi veli .
Translation You 're dressed all in white like a lily . Your ebony tresses are shining on ivory shoulders .
willow_rosenberg My turn ?
aldo_gianfranco Mm - hmm !
xander_harris I love these bars !
xander_harris A Chocolate Hurricane ! These are the best ! I have n't had one of these since my ... .
xander_harris ... sixth ... ... birthday .
buffy_summers I do n't see the Ugly Man . I also do n't know where the sun and the rest of the world went .
billy_palmer Look at this .
billy_palmer I guess we 're gon na bury someone . I wonder who died .
the_master Nobody died .
the_master What 's the fun of burying someone if they 're already dead ?
buffy_summers You !
the_master So ! This is the Slayer ! You 're prettier than the last one .
buffy_summers This is n't real . Y - you ca n't be free !

the_master You still do n't understand , do you ? I am free because you fear it . Because you fear it , the world is crumbling . Your nightmares are made flesh . You have little Billy to thank for that .
buffy_summers This is a dream .
the_master A dream is a wish your heart makes . This is real life . Come on , Slayer ! What are you afraid of ?
buffy_summers No ! Help me !
the_master How 'bout being buried alive ?
buffy_summers Somebody help me ! Please ! No ! No ! Please ! No ! No ! No ! Somebody help me ! Please ! No !
buffy_summers Please ! No ! Help me ! No !
buffy_summers Help !
xander_harris Did you find Buffy ?
willow_rosenberg I had to sing ! Very bad to sing !
xander_harris Willow , c'mon . Let 's find the others .
willow_rosenberg What happened to you ?
xander_harris Remember my sixth birthday party ?
willow_rosenberg Oh , yeah ! When the clown chased you and you got so scared that you had ... Oh !
rupert_giles No sign of Buffy ?
xander_harris You are a lousy clown ! Your balloon animals are pathetic ! Everyone can make a giraffe !
xander_harris I feel good ! I feel liberated !
rupert_giles You seem to be the only one . Things are getting worse . In a few hours reality will fold completely into the realm of nightmares .
willow_rosenberg Well , what do we do ?
rupert_giles The only thing I can think is to try and wake Billy .
xander_harris Uh , no , we ca n't leave without Buffy .
rupert_giles Agreed , but who knows where she might have gone ?
willow_rosenberg Excuse me , when did they put a cemetery in across the street ?
xander_harris And when did they make it night over there ?
xander_harris Whose nightmare is this ?
rupert_giles It 's mine .

rupert_giles I 've failed ... . in my duty to protect you . I should have been more c ... . cautious . Taken more time to train you . But you were so gifted . And the evil was so great . I 'm sorry ... .
rupert_giles Buffy ?
buffy_summers I thought I was dead !
willow_rosenberg Buffy , your face !
buffy_summers Oh , God !
xander_harris Buffy ... .
buffy_summers Do n't look at me !
rupert_giles You never told me you dreamt of becoming a vampire .
buffy_summers This is n't a dream .

rupert_giles No . No , it 's not . But there 's a chance that we can make it go away . This all comes from Billy . Now , if , if we can only wake him up , I believe that the nightmares will stop and reality will shift back into place , but we must do it now ! I need you to hold together long enough to help us . Can you do that ?
buffy_summers Yeah . I think I can .
rupert_giles Thank you .
buffy_summers Well , we better hurry ... 'cause I 'm getting hungry .
xander_harris That is a ... joke , right ?
willow_rosenberg Are you sure everything will go back once he 's awake ?
rupert_giles Oh , uh , positive .
willow_rosenberg Well , how do we wake Billy up ? What if we ca n't ?
rupert_giles Willow , do shut up .
rupert_giles Doctor ! Is the boy Billy still here ?
doctor My hands !
xander_harris What now ?
rupert_giles Um ... Billy ! Billy ?
billy_palmer That wo n't work .
rupert_giles Billy ! Uh , Billy , you have to wake up .
billy_palmer No . I told her . I have to hide .
rupert_giles Why ? From what ?
buffy_summers From him !
xander_harris Aw , man , what do we do ?
buffy_summers I think I know .
willow_rosenberg Whatever it is , it better be soon !
buffy_summers Glad you showed up ! You see , I 'm having a really bad day .
Ugly_Man Lucky nineteen !
buffy_summers Scary ! I 'll tell you something , though . There are a lot scarier things than you . And I 'm one of them .
billy_palmer I - is he dead ?
buffy_summers Come here , Billy .
billy_palmer I , I do n't ... .
buffy_summers You have to do the rest .
